MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL15 postcode area of Ruthin, affecting properties in Rhewl and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required to a fault on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.26PM on 17th December 2020.
